Intro Scene

Storyboard

Scene 1

Scene fades in to a bustling market. There is some light music for ambiance but the general sounds of the market are more prominent. A man pulling a 2 wheeled cart crosses in front of the camera - this changes the scene to a panning view of a lake.

Scene 2

There are 2 men in the lake fishing. There is no music playing, only some nice quiet sounds of nature. The scene is serene. Scene flashes to next scene.

Scene 3

A woman holds a pan over a fire in the fireplace cooking something. Her husband snoozes in a rocking chair nearby. Scene flashes to next scene

Scene 4

Several children play with a lopsided ball, kicking it around a field. There don't appear to be any rules or organization whatsoever. Slow fade away.

Scene 5

Shot comes in suddenly. Quiet music in background - orchestral and dramatic.

A zooming away shot of the city of Vaalnor - on the horizon a brilliant blue flash expands from a single point until it covers the entire sky. Scene cuts strait to next scene.

Scene 6

Same as Scene 5 except the city zooming out from is Vestrim. Same blue flash, etc...

Scene 7

Same as Scene 5 except the city zooming out from is Curagoth. Same blue flash, etc...

Scene 8

Cuts to market area from first scene. People are all looking at the blue flash expanding over the horizon.

Scene 9

Cuts to lake area from second scene. The fishermen are looking at the blue flash expanding over the horizon.

Scene 10

Cuts to woman cooking in third scene. The woman is staring out the window at the bright blue flash.

Scene 11

The kids from the 4th scene scatter in fear, some run, some stop watch the blue expand across the sky.

Scene 12

A scene of rolling hills. As the bright light reaches its peak, several giant grotesque creatures come into view, dotting the countryside. Then the landscape changes to a burnt black for a moment, then the light fades back, and the regular landscape fades back into view. Some of the creatures vanish, but many are still there. Camera zooms in one one, revealing its gargantuan stature, silhouetted against the sky.

Could be something like this: Reference Image

Scene 13

The beasts are going crazy, tearing through the various towns. Scenes here flip randomly, buildings crumble, people are thrown about like rag dolls. Essentially it flows through many undefined chaotic scenes of death and destruction. Slowly the screen fades out from the mayhem.
